You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 466, 808, 481]]<|/det|> - Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 481, 565, 496]]<|/det|> - Write your answer to each question in the space provided. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 497, 478, 512]]<|/det|> - Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 513, 361, 528]]<|/det|> - Do not write on any bar codes. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 529, 550, 544]]<|/det|> - You should use a scientific calculator where appropriate. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 544, 335, 559]]<|/det|> - You may use tracing paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 560, 466, 575]]<|/det|> - You must show all necessary working clearly. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 575, 854, 590]]<|/det|> - Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 605, 487, 620]]<|/det|> - For \(\pi\), use either your calculator value or 3.142. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 651, 214, 664]]<|/det|> INFORMATION <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 667, 395, 682]]<|/det|> - The total mark for this paper is 100. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 682, 730, 699]]<|/det|> - The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ] . <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[270, 868, 727, 885]]<|/det|> This document has 20 pages. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 121, 367, 138]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of triangle, base \(b\), height \(h\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 115, 682, 146]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\frac{1}{2} b h
\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 166, 672, 184]]<|/det|>
\[

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 170, 308, 185]]<|/det|>
Area, \(A\), of circle of radius \(r\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 219, 385, 234]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 219, 672, 233]]<|/det|>
\[
C=2 \pi r
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 267, 515, 284]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 265, 686, 281]]<|/det|>
\[
A=2 \pi r h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 314, 537, 331]]<|/det|>
Curved surface area, \(A\), of cone of radius \(r\), sloping edge \(l\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 314, 672, 330]]<|/det|>
\[
A=\pi r l
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 363, 373, 379]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 359, 682, 378]]<|/det|>
\[

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 410, 490, 426]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 408, 664, 426]]<|/det|>
\[
V=A l
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 456, 435, 474]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 449, 682, 480]]<|/det|>
\[
V=\frac{1}{3} A h
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 507, 421, 523]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 503, 680, 521]]<|/det|>

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 554, 396, 571]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 546, 690, 575]]<|/det|>

\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[83, 605, 336, 620]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[603, 595, 686, 626]]<|/det|>
